page.title: 14PLACES OF WORSHIP IN OTLEY
page.content: { {There are various places of Worship in Otley.The biggest the Parish Church,partly built in 1100,AD,the rest 1250/1350,AD.It is called a Cruciformed because it is shaped like a cross.It has a bell tower and steeple,and a graveyard,It is C/of/E. It has 4 services each Sunday. Our Lady and all Saints R.C.,Church was built in the middle of the 19 century,and is a medium sized Church with a Bell Tower. The United Reformed Church with Bell Tower was built in 1899. There are also Methodists,Jehovah's witnesses,Spiritualist,Christian Fellowship,Bethany and Bethal Evangecal,Places of Worship.Bethal Evangelecal is the Salvation Army's Headquarters.By Dominic Rose.
